title: Parliamentary Meetings Records 1861-1913
additionalLoadingInfo: Searching for more frequent words may take longer.
noResults: No results found for your search.
noAgenda: The record does not contain an agenda.
totalFound: Number of sentences that match all search criteria
aboutText1:
This web application is used to search multilingual proceedings of historical parliamentary sessions that have been scanned and OCR-processed and are available in digital form. The application allows you to search for texts, speakers and place names. It is also possible to filter the results by language, date of creation and corpus and to sort the results by date and relevance.

Once the proceedings have been found, you can browse through them and search for their content. Instead of a facsimile of the document, you can also view a transcript in several languages, which also supports the content search.
aboutSubtitle1: How to search the content of the proceedings
aboutText2:
By default, the keyword search finds all proceedings that contain all the words in the query. To search for documents that contain at least one of the specified search words, separate them with an OR in the search field. You can also search for a phrase. In this case, the phrase is placed in quotation marks (e.g. "kmetijska šola"). You can also search for translations of the text.

If the search word is entered in its basic form (lemma), the search will also find all other forms of the word (e.g. for the search word šola (school), the words šoli, šolo, šole, etc. will also be found).

The search in the PDF facsimile finds all occurrences of the entered search words as they are written (it does not search by lemma or in translations).
aboutText3: The corpus of the Carniolan Provincial Assembly (1861-1913) is available in the Clarin.si repository. It comprises 694 sessions, with each session containing a linguistically annotated text in TEI XML format and a facsimile in PDF format. The corpus was created by the Faculty of Computer and Information Science of the University of Ljubljana in collaboration with the Institute of Contemporary History; the facsimiles of the documents are also available on the portal History of Slovenia - SIstory.

tooltip: The hits that are the result of searching all relevant records do not necessarily match the hits of searching the PDF document or the transcript of the document. Searching all records also takes into account lemmas and translations of words, while searching the PDF document and the transcript only takes into account the displayed words that exactly match the search string.
